subject: I am Rev poole Benjamin DHL Di
body:
I am Rev poole Benjamin DHL Diplomatic Agent.
I have received your Fund Consignment Box worth $8.5 million USD.
Eight million Five Hundred Thousand United States Dollars in my office
as it could be delivered your home address or through bank transaction
before two young men by name WILLIAM HUGES and JOHN CAMEL came with a
sad news of your death they also claim to be your relatives As they
make enquiry to claim your Fund as it is their rightful inheritance
they told us that you gave them the permissions at the hospital bed to
claim your money before you die we couldn't hand over your money to
them untill we find out that you are dead and
 if they are truely your
sons please reconfirm with your information if you are still alive and
if you know these two men
YOUR CURRENT PHONE NUMBER......
YOUR HOME ADDRESS ...............
YOUR AIRPORT ADDRESS .......
YOUR VALID ID CARD
 ..............
YOUR EMAIL ADDRESS.......

subject: Re: I am Rev poole Benjamin DHL Di
body:
Hello Rev Poole Benjamin,

Thank you for your message. I must say, it's quite a surprise to hear about my own death! I can assure you that I am very much alive and well. As for William Huges and John Camel, I don't recall knowing anyone by those names. 

I'm curious though, how did these gentlemen come to know about this fund? And why would they think it belongs to them? Also, could you please explain more about this fund? How did it come into existence and why is it under my name?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

P.S: For security reasons, I prefer not to share personal information like phone numbers, addresses or ID cards over email.

Best wishes,
Kristina
